metadata.title: CVE-2017-5754 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - critical
metadata.description:
Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirectbranch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to anattacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis of the datacache.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5754` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
